dct_title_s: A map of the River Gambia from its mouth to Eropina
dct_alternative_sm: A map of the River Gambia from Eropina to Barrakunda
dct_description_sm: by Capt. John Leach in 1732 ; T. Kitchen sculpt.
Two sheets combine to capture full length of the Gambia River.
Shows topography, drainage, cities and towns, routes.
Descriptive text at bottom left of sheet 2.
"Pl. 149, No. 87, Vol. 2, p. 356." at bottom left margin of sheet 2.
"Plate 150. No. 87. Vol. 2. p. 357" at bottom left margin of sheet 2.
Collector's note: Includes illustrations of 4 insets: 2 insects ( large unusual winged ), 1 ant of natural bigness, 1 anthill or Pismires nest; Pl. 149, No. 87, vol. 2, p. 356.
